PoliceStation.text: Pass a Will (-1) check to convince Deputy Dingo to share some files with you that are very interesting. Gain 2 Clue tokens.

HibbsRoadhouse.text: A stranger buys you a drink. You may search the Common Item deck for a Whiskey Card and take it.

VelmasDiner.text: "This must be where pies go when they die." If you want, $1 to enjoy a fine slice of cherry pie. If you do, gain 2 Stamina.
